root.message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 15-5-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: The IUCN Red List is governed by a Red List Committee (https://www.iucn.org/our-union/commissions/group/iucn-ssc-red-list-committee), comprising representatives from the Red List Partnership, the IUCN Species Survival Commission, and the IUCN Secretariat. This committee establishes and maintains the Red List Strategic Plan, including ongoing evaluation of fitness for use i.e. the degree to which the IUCN Red List meets user’s requirements. This encompasses, inter alia, considerations of relevance, accuracy, timeliness, consistency, comprehensiveness, and accessibility.
